name: cf-deploy
description: Reusable Cloudflare Workers deploy toolkit â€” CLI + versions manifest + version picker web component

scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist && bun build ./bin/cf-deploy.ts --outfile dist/cf-deploy.js --target bun --bundle
scripts.build-all: mkdir -p dist && bun run build-js && bun run build-linux-x64 && bun run build-linux-arm64 && bun run build-macos-x64 && bun run build-macos-arm64
scripts.test:e2e: bun x playwright install --with-deps chromium && bun x playwright test
scripts.ci:build: bun install && bun run build-js && cd example && bun install
scripts.ci:deploy: : ${PROD_URL:?PROD_URL required} && CF=../dist/cf-deploy.js && cd example && bun $CF versions-json && bun $CF upload && bun $CF smoke $PROD_URL && bun $CF promote
scripts.ci:full: bun run check && bun run ci:build && bun run ci:deploy && bun run ci:e2e
